description:
Hanakiri Ganryu is a proud second lieutenant in the imperial army. He is chosen to be a human representative in the Ministry of Spirit Affairs and is partnered with Bonbori and Hozuki. He is able to tell the twins apart while they were trying to confuse him despite the fact that they are exactly identical except for their voices. It`s indicated that for his age, he is advanced in terms of intelligence and skill.
Source: Wiki
name: Hanakiri Ganryuu
